ingredients: 1 cup dates, pitted and chopped, 1 cup dark brown sugar,   +   1/4 cup margarine, 1 cup boiling water, 1   +   3/4 cups self-rising flour, 1 teaspoon baking soda, 2 teaspoons vanilla extract
nutrition: Total Fat 4g 5%, Saturated Fat 1g 4%, Sodium 386mg 17%, Total Carbohydrate 41g 15%, Dietary Fiber 2g 5%, Total Sugars 26g, Protein 2g, Vitamin C 0mg 1%, Calcium 83mg 6%, Iron 1mg 6%, Potassium 130mg 3%
